Articles.Content: Holy Shit, I just brought the Pod into the orbit of the sun... will it stay there? or will it eventually go back to the earth?
While the Spacecraft Exchange isn\'t the right place for this thread, yes it can find itself back in Kerbin\'s Sphere of Influence, but it will most likely take a very, very long time.

Welcome to the forum.

The only way it\'ll get back to Kerbin is if its orbit intercepts that of kerbin, or comes pretty damn close. Otherwise no, it\'ll just keep orbitting the sun.
